body:
The correct answer appears to be the following:

  • Remove the foreign key from T2
  • Remove the primary key from T1
  • Add a column to T1 as primary key and identity
  • Add a column to T2 with the same type as the new column described in the previous step
  • Make the new column of T2 foreign key and index it
title: What are the steps to modify a table from 3NF to BCNF along with its dependency using SSMS?
